radius.description: Determines the radius of the area.
radius.markdownDescription: Determines the radius of the area.

shape.description: Determines the shape of the area.
shape.markdownDescription: Determines the shape of the area.

block_action.description: The block action to execute on the blocks within the specified radius.
block_action.markdownDescription: The block action to execute on the blocks within the specified radius.

block_condition.description: If specified, the specified block action will only be executed on blocks that fulfill this block condition.
block_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified block action will only be executed on blocks that fulfill this block condition.

type.description:
[Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/area_of_effect)

Executes the provided [Block Action Type](../block_action_types.md) on all blocks within the specified radius and shape.

Type ID: `origins:area_of_effect`
type.markdownDescription:
[Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/area_of_effect)

Executes the provided [Block Action Type](../block_action_types.md) on all blocks within the specified radius and shape.

Type ID: `origins:area_of_effect`
